title: Firefox Often Freezing Up When Downloading an Attachment on my MACBOOK Pro
content:
Friday February 6, 2026

Been using Firefox since 2014 and as my primary browser for personal research, etc. and Google's Chrome about half the time for company-related work. It's been my favorite browser. I'm using the current updated Firefox 147.0.3 (aarch64) and and Apple's O/S macOS Sequoia Version 15.7.3.

However, for at least 8 months or more now, Firefox has become completely unreliable for downloading files to save on my virtual drive in my MacBook Pro M3 Max because it often if not always freezes up in the process. I have to curse again (!) then Force Quit, reboot, and everything instantly comes back up on the monitor as if nothing happened, only of course I did not accomplish the task of downloading and saving the file I needed to handle. 

I have discovered by talking to folks and by researching Firefox's support information library that I'm "not alone".  Not by far.  This problem IS a Firefox issue.  I've tried to follow Firefox's several different solutions to overcome whatever the root cause of the problem is, but without success.  The TIME required to really go through this problem-solving process is a killer.  And, yea, since I'm physically practically in OPEN AI's backyard, I have consulted CHAT GPT and it also confirmed this issue between Firefox and Apple's O'S macOS Sequoia Version 15.7.3 and practically gave me a Masters thesis about.  Who has time for this?  Why can't Firefox solve this problem to make this easy for us?

S0 now, before I update my O/S to macOS Tahoe 26.3, does anyone know if between Apple and Firefox this problem has been solved? For 10 years it was never a problem. What the heck happened? Firefox is no longer my primary browser, for I never know for sure whether or not I'll need to download and save to my Mac's virtual drive a file.

Thanks for any constructive comments anyone may make! And Happy Friday. ~ GPB

title: can no longer sign in to gmail
content:
I can't sign in to gmail as I used to for years. (It works ok when I use Private Browsing, but that's inconvenient.)

WHAT USED TO HAPPEN: when I was at the sign in page, my password manager (Dashlane) filled in the username and then a screen asking to use the passkey. I said yes, and got in to Google with no problem.

NOW: the password manager fills in my username (my name at gmail.com) and when I hit "NEXT" in the sign in field I get email or phone l.com When I click in the field that disappears and my username appears. When I hit NEXT it goes back to "email or phone l.com". Same when I hit return. Same when I enter my phone number. SO maybe it's Dashlane (my password manager)? But when I disable that and TYPE my username (or phone number) in the field, same stuff happens.

BUT when I use a private browser window, the gmail sign in works as before, and so that's what I've been using -- but it's not convenient having 2 windows open. Before it was just a tab in one window. What changed? Why? Can I change it back? Thanks!

title: Is Vastu Certificate Course Really Worth It in 2026? My Honest Experience & Research
content:
I was searching for a Vastu Certificate Course because I wanted something practical, certified, and useful for real life - not just theory. During my research, I noticed many people on forums asking the same questions: Which Vastu course is best? Is online Vastu learning effective? Does certification actually matter?

After comparing multiple options, here‚Äôs what I found and why a structured Vastu Course makes a real difference.

ü§î What Exactly Is a Vastu Certificate Course? A Vastu Certificate Course is a professional program that teaches the principles of Vastu Shastra with practical application. Unlike random YouTube videos, a proper Vastu Shastra Course covers directions, elements, plot analysis, remedies, and real case studies - ending with a valid certificate.

Certification matters because it builds trust when you start consulting or advising others professionally.

üìö Can Beginners Join a Vastu Course? This was my biggest doubt. The answer is yes. Most modern Vastu courses are designed for beginners. Institutes like BIVS (Bhartiya Institute of Vedic Science) explain concepts in simple language, step-by-step, without assuming prior knowledge.

Even if you are from a non-spiritual background or just curious about Vastu, a beginner-friendly Vastu Course helps you learn from basics to advanced applications.

üè† Is Online Vastu Shastra Course Effective? Many people ask this on forums - and honestly, online learning works if the course is structured well. A good Vastu Shastra Course includes live or recorded sessions, practical layouts, real examples, and expert guidance.

BIVS provides online learning with lifetime access, which helps learners revise anytime and practice concepts at their own pace.

üîÆ Why Do People Combine Vastu Course with Numerology Course? Interestingly, many learners opt for a Numerology Course along with Vastu. Both are Vedic sciences and complement each other. Numerology helps understand numbers and vibrations, while Vastu focuses on space and energy flow.

Institutes like BIVS offer both options, making it easier for students to expand their skill set and consulting opportunities.

üéì Does Certificate from BIVS Have Value? Yes. A certificate from a reputed institute like BIVS adds credibility. Whether you want to start consulting, add Vastu services to your profession, or simply gain knowledge, certification shows structured learning and professional commitment.

‚úÖ Final Verdict: Should You Enroll? If you‚Äôre serious about learning Vastu professionally, a Vastu Certificate Course is absolutely worth it. Choose a course that is practical, beginner-friendly, and certified - like the programs offered by BIVS.

It‚Äôs not just about learning Vastu; it‚Äôs about applying it confidently in real life.
creator: bivs

title: Payment methods description
content:
Hi,

when using the built-in Payment Methods feature in Firefox, I find it quite difficult to distinguish between multiple saved cards, especially when they are visually very similar.

In my case, I‚Äôm working with several Stripe test cards for development, and they often only differ in subtle details (like the last digits). This makes it easy to pick the wrong card during checkout or testing.

Is there currently a way to add a custom description or label to a saved payment card (for example ‚ÄúStripe test ‚Äì successful payment‚Äù or ‚ÄúStripe test ‚Äì 3D Secure‚Äù) that would be shown in the card selection dialog?

If not, is this something that‚Äôs planned or already discussed as a potential improvement? From a developer‚Äôs perspective, this would be a big usability win.

Thanks in advance!

MINUTES Subject Meeting Minutes - Meeting with the Provincial Administrator, Western Province. HE Alphonse Robert Kaiyun Venue Secretary‚Äôs Office, 5th Floor, Morauta House, Waigani. NCD Time 1610 ‚Äì 1715hrs Date 5 February 2026 In attendance Secretary ‚Äì Mr. Philip Leo Provincial Administrator ‚Äì Mr. Alphonse R. Kaiyun Acting Director Technical Support Services ‚Äì Mr. Orocqo EPH Inerehu Acting Ex. Officer ‚Äì Mr. Edward Yowe

1. Introduction A courtesy meeting was held between the Administrator of Western Province with Secretary DPLLGA ensued with the following discussions and undertakings

2. The Provincial Administrator visited Secretary with the following issues of concerns which he came to share with Secretary, to gauge his views and if possible gain support for his own initiatives he advanced in the administration of his Province with development plans triggered from the villages, communities, wards, and LLGs to cascade with and harmonize with his DSIP, PSIP, and in overall alignment with the MTDP4. 3. He emphasized the urgent and dire need of such plans to put villages and communities in order with organized services that trigger ordinary village developments, organizing towards improving services, and advancing lives for ordinary population, and improving qualities and standards for the ordinary citizens. 4. He pointed out the missing link or disconnect in planning between the DSIP, PSIP, and the overall NDP and in particular the MTDP4. How could a local village and community in PNG improve its deteriorating services if the current scenario remains uncovered, especially by way of advancing planned interventions and National Government attention and leadership with structured and formatted delivery of basic services to the village and community levels? 5. bold text

title: Wwhen I attempt to use Firefox web, I now am being asked to enter my Primary password, I have used what I recall was my password but I cant log in
content: After the last system update, I now am being asked to enter my "Primary password", every time I open a new page. When I try entering a password , it is not recognized and I have to click on cancel in order to proceed. I have used what I recall was my password but it is recognized, but I don't get a message telling me it is the wrong password. How can I get back to the previous version that did not ask for my Password. Is that an option?
